alert.note: Alert for Amite; Pike (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern St. Helena and northwestern Tangipahoa Parishes, southern Pike and southeastern Amite Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greensburg, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Amite City, Magnolia, Kentwood, Roseland, Osyka, Gillsburg, Easleyville, Tangipahoa and Mccomb Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 47 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
